string.text: A voice from the north has called for you. You should try to find the source.
The voice calling you must be from the Wish Granter. You should be able to find it somewhere in the sarcophagus.
Find the hidden Monolith base mentioned in the manuscript and discover what it is hiding.
Destroy the Wish Granter: defeat all 10 waves of projections conjured by the Wish Granter.
Disable the power supply generators of the C-Consciousness pods.
